overview: Fastdrips – The Movie is bucking the current trend of “Interrailing” and shows what´s up these days in German train graffiti. Apart from the main acting ORG Crew (Leipzig) there are also featured: OO Crew (Magdeburg), ISM (Augsburg), OWA, GRS, MTA (all three from Chemnitz) and VDE. The guys rock the place and produce lots of burners!
title: Fastdrips
